front.title: Retiring the Tao of the IETF

abstract.t: This document retires the Tao of the IETF as an IETF-maintained document. It includes the rationale for the retirement and the last edition of the Tao as published via the process described in [RFC6722]. Information that new participants need to engage in the work of the IETF will continue to be updated on the IETF website in a more timely and accessible manner.
